# <a name="read-receipts"></a><span data-ttu-id="7a6f9-102">Vastamine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7a6f9-102">Read receipts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7a6f9-103">Lugemisteatise või sõnumile vastuvõtuteatist taotleda:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7a6f9-103">To request a read receipt or a delivery receipt for your message:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="7a6f9-104">Valige kolm punkti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7a6f9-104">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="7a6f9-105">sõnumi ülaosas moodustavad paani.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7a6f9-105">at the top of the message compose pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="7a6f9-106">Valige **sõnumi suvandeid**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7a6f9-106">Select **Show message options**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="7a6f9-107">Valige **taotleda** või **Taotle vastuvõtuteatist**või mõlemad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7a6f9-107">Select **Request a read receipt** or **Request a delivery receipt**, or both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7a6f9-108">Et valida, kuidas Outlook vastuseks lugemisteatise taotluse, minge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7a6f9-108">To choose how Outlook responds to read receipt requests, go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="7a6f9-109">**Seaded** > **kõik Outlooki sätete vaatamine** > **sõnumi käitlemise**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7a6f9-109">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Message handling**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7a6f9-110">Lisateabe saamiseks vt [Outlook Web vastamine](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7a6f9-110">For more information, see [Read receipts in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span></span>
